Hero.title: Digital Social Protection Platform
Hero.content: Register, Verify Social Protection identity data and Transfer various Social Protection benefits packages through a Single Digital Platform

SPR.title: Social Protection Registry
SPR.what_is_spr: What is Digital Social Protection Registry?
SPR.what_is_spr_desc: Social Protection Registry is a Social Protection Identity data Data Exchange which play an important role toward achieving Interoperability between Social Protection and Social Security Operators in Cambodia which allowing Data Harmonization, Data Synchronization within the Eco-system including Demographic, Bio-metric and Socioeconomic data

advantages_of_spr_items.item2: Provide Unique Social Protection Identifier (SPID)  for usage in receiving benefit from Social Protection Schemes
advantages_of_spr_items.item3: Prevention of redundant registrations and data collection for Social Protection and Social Security schemes
advantages_of_spr_items.item4: Expedited verification of beneficiary identification leading to a decrease in fraud, overuse, or duplication of benefits

Portal.title: Digital Social Protection Single Registration Portal
Portal.what_is_portal: What is Digital Social Protection Single Registration Portal?
Portal.what_isPortal_desc: Single Registration Portal is The One Stop Service for register beneficiary into Social Protection and Social Security programs and schemes assisting in eliminate redundant processes and registrations
Portal.advantages_of_portal: Benefits of Digital Social Protection Single Registration Portal

advantages_of_portal_items.item1: Enhancing service efficiency in Social Protection
advantages_of_portal_items.item2: Harmonization of Social Registry, Social Protection Data Management, and Digital Infrastructure toward Interoperability of ICT systems as an Eco-system
advantages_of_portal_items.item3: Improve Data quality and readiness to assist Management and Policy maker in strategic decision-making (Evidence-based)
advantages_of_portal_items.item4: Improve and Enhance coordination and communication between stakeholders and activities for revolutionize Digital Social Protection
